data.title: Christian Berkel: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Christian Berkel: Check out the list of all Christian Berkel movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Christian Berkel news on Times of India.
data.text:
IED movement from Jammu? Ahead of Independence Day, fidayeen attack alert in Delhi

tnn / Aug 14, 2024, 10:33 (IST)

The intelligence community has remained on high alert due to information about operatives from a terrorist group in Jammu potentially planning a fidayeen attack in Delhi or Punjab around Independence Day. Security measures have been intensified, particularly for the celebrations and the President's 'At Home' reception, amidst reports of explosives and potential high-profile targets.

How this stock market star is adding muscle to Indian Navy

timesofindia.com / Aug 13, 2024, 11:02 (IST)

The 250-year-old Mazagon Dock in Mumbai is the biggest naval shipbuilder in India, delivering submarines, frigates and destroyers with consistency. After going public in 2020, it’s also delivered solid returns to investors year after year

Ahead of polls, Raut pokes ally Congress: 'If you have a CM face, make it public'

tnn / Aug 14, 2024, 08:30 (IST)

Sanjay Raut of Shiv Sena (UBT) asked Congress to publicly name their candidate for Maharashtra's Chief Minister post in response to Nana Patole's claim that the Congress party should decide the CM face if Sharad Pawar or Uddhav Thackeray do not. Raut welcomed naming a Congress leader for the position.

Suryakumar Yadav says 'sorry' for this reason

timesofindia.com / Aug 14, 2024, 09:29 (IST)

Suryakumar is also focused on making his mark in Test cricket, despite his success in the shorter formats. Mumbai will be led by Sarfaraz Khan, who has been a standout performer in domestic cricket recently. With Iyer and Suryakumar joining the squad, Mumbai's batting lineup is poised to be strong, enhancing their chances of making a significant impact in the tournament.

CBSE mandates NCERT textbooks: New guidelines effective immediately

toi education / Aug 14, 2024, 10:16 (IST)

The CBSE has revised its Affiliation Bye-Laws to mandate the use of NCERT textbooks for schools, effective immediately. The new guidelines, detailed in Chapter 2, Clause 2.4.7, require schools to use NCERT or SCERT books for Classes I to VIII and CBSE books for Classes IX to XII. Schools must also ensure that all supplementary materials and digital content align with national frameworks and avoid objectionable content. A list of prescribed books must be published on school websites.

Are Siddaramaiah’s days as Karnataka CM numbered?

timesofindia.com / Aug 13, 2024, 17:15 (IST)

Trouble is brewing for the Congress in Karnataka as the BJP-led Opposition tries to bring pressure on Siddaramaiah to resign in a corruption case that involves his wife and family

Remove these Amul videos: Delhi High Court to YT, FB and Instagram

timesofindia.com / Aug 14, 2024, 00:49 (IST)

The Delhi High Court ordered a Noida resident to remove defamatory videos about Amul products from social media. This followed a viral claim of a centipede found in an Amul ice cream tub. Non-compliance led to the court directing platforms like X, YouTube, and Meta to take down the content within 36 hours.

'Cautionary tale for ... ': What Vivek Ramaswamy said on violence against Hindus in Bangladesh

timesofindia.com / Aug 14, 2024, 08:01 (IST)

Vivek Ramaswamy, a former Republican presidential candidate, condemned the violence against Hindus in Bangladesh following Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's ouster. He criticized the quota system implemented after the 1971 independence war, which he argued led to protests and the government's collapse. Ramaswamy highlighted that radicals are now targeting Hindu minorities amidst the political turmoil.

This day that year: Sachin Tendulkar scored his maiden international ton

timesofindia.com / Aug 14, 2024, 10:46 (IST)

Sachin Tendulkar, at age 17, scored his maiden international century on August 14, 1990, against England at Old Trafford, helping India secure a draw. This was the first of his 100 international hundreds. Tendulkar debuted for India at 16 and retired in 2013, holding numerous records, including being the first to score a double century in ODIs.
